content:
Hi All, those following the Patient merge track, it's going to be tracked under the Patient adminsitration stream
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179254-patient-administration.20WG/topic/Connectathon.20Patient.20Merge

Synthea has a "split record" feature that may or may not be useful for the Patient Merge track. See https://github.com/synthetichealth/synthea/wiki/Splitting-Records-and-Duplicate-Data if you want a dataset to run your algorithms on.
Thanks Jason, A couple of us are busy working on our implementations after some discussion this morning and reviewing @Charles Ye s implementation.
